title: Overwater Maldives Paradise with All-Inclusive Gourmet Dining and Return Domestic Flight Transfers
description: Live like a celebrity and experience the ultimate overwater private pool Maldives getaway, staying at the five-star Amilla Fushi in the dreamy Baa Atoll. Holiday like an A-lister and relax in style, following in the footsteps of Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Moss and David and Victoria Beckham. Your getaway includes return domestic transfers between Male and the resort by domestic flight and speedboat, and all gourmet dining including daily breakfast, lunch and dinner.

title: Brand-New Maldives Oasis with All-Inclusive Dining, Unlimited Free-Flow Drinks & Roundtrip Transfers
description:
Oceans of indulgence await at this resort in the glorious Baa Atoll. Located on the western edge of a UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, surrounded by an impressive 14 dive sites and swarmed by a 220-metre house reef, guests at this heavenly resort couldn't be better placed in paradise.

Seven bars and restaurants are sprinkled across the island, each offering unique experiences inspired by their tropical surroundings. A walk along the beach will bring you to Tribe - a sand-sunken tiki bar with live music. Bordering the treeline and coast, Smuggler's Shack beckons with rum cocktails and fresh sushi. The Ocean Terrace satiates cravings for international dishes, while Charcoal provides an onsite sommelier for nights of fine wining and dining.

The resort's spa borrows therapeutic remedies from across the globe - choose from Thai or Swedish massages, practise yoga with private breathwork and meditation sessions, release stress with an ayurvedic massage and feel relaxed among the spa's lush foliage.

title: The Maldives: All-Inclusive Dining & Overwater Luxury
description: Live like a celebrity and experience the ultimate overwater private pool Maldives getaway with five nights at the five-star Amilla Fushi including all your meals. Holiday like an A-lister and relax in style, following in the footsteps of the likes of Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Moss and David and Victoria Beckham.

title: Finolhu: All-Inclusive, Overwater Maldives Paradise
description: Surrender to island life with an all-inclusive dream stay in an overwater Lagoon Villa at the stylish Finolhu resort, nestled amidst the crystalline lagoon waters and white sands of the Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve in the Maldives. Your indulgent five-night escape includes your domestic plane and speedboat transfers from Male, all meals (including three upgraded dining experiences), unlimited alcoholic and soft drinks and snorkeling.

title: Idyllic Maldives Villa Indulgence with Private Pool & Underwater Restaurant
description: Feel the magic of the Maldives all around you at Anantara Kihavah Maldives Villas, a resplendent island oasis within the breathtaking Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve. Drink champagne beneath the stars at SKY, dine under the ocean's placid surface and watch colourful marine life pass you by at SEA or choose from four other experiential restaurants. Take advantage of personalised wellness programs and ayurvedic spa pampering so you return home feeling reset and renewed.
offer_address: Kihavah Huravalhi Island, Baa Atoll, Republic of Maldives 20215

title: Maldives Private Island Five-Star Resort with Beachfront or Overwater Villas & Padi Dive Centre
description:
Nestled amidst crystal-clear waters and pristine beaches of the Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve, this dreamlike Maldivian paradise offers indulgence like no other. The resort boasts eight exquisite bars and restaurants, each offering a unique culinary journey, with the Indian Ocean, coconut groves and breathtaking sunsets as your backdrop.

At Vakkaru Maldives, wellness and relaxation are at the heart of your stay. Unwind at the Merana Spa, where skilled therapists provide rejuvenating treatments and specialised Ayurveda by Siddhalepa holistic therapy. When you're not basking in the resort's tranquility, dive into the vibrant underwater world with the onsite dive centre or enjoy the thrill of motorised water sports. Prefer a calmer pace? Opt for a paddle through the crystalline waters on a kayak or paddleboard, or make the most of the sports fields with a game of volleyball or padel.

title: Five-Star Oceanfront Maldives Paradise with Resort Pool, Seven Gourmet Dining Outlets & Poolside Bar
description: Savour moments of pure tropical bliss overlooking the sparkling lagoon framed by swaying palms at Avani+ Fares Maldives Resort. Indulge in direct access to the secluded beach, enjoy a drink beside the resort pool, or explore the colourful nearby reef. Enhance your opulent ocean stay with a visit to the resortâ€™s spa for an impressive treatment, or with a delectable meal at one of seven dining options, each boasting tantalizing menus and unparalleled ambiance.

title: Secluded Maldives Private Pool Bliss with 10 Onsite Dining Venues, Cellar Door & World-Class Spa
description:
Experience the tropical high life at this secluded five-star sanctuary located in the Maldives' Baa Atoll. Surrounded by crystal-clear turquoise waters, lush greenery and white sandy beaches, this breathtaking resort takes its rightful place as a member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World, being the only Maldives resort in the Considerate Collection. 

Dine on fresh seafood at the overwater Japanese restaurant, Feeling Koi, enjoy a cocktail at the laidback Emperor Beach Club or take a dip in your villa's private pool. Explore the vibrant coral reefs, teeming with marine life, take a stroll along the pristine beach, or indulge in a beauty treatment at Javvu Spa.

title: Maldives Private Island Barefoot Luxury with the World's First Zipline Fine-Dining Experience
description:
**Update: 11th December 2024:** As per the amendments to the Tourism Act issued by the Maldivian Government, applicable to all travellers arriving in the Maldives from 1 January 2025, the green tax payable by travellers upon arrival at hotels (including tourist resorts, tourist hotels, hotels, tourist guest houses, tourist vessels) has been increased from USD 6.00 to USD 12.00 per person per day.

Dive into a world of unparalleled barefoot luxury at Soneva Fushi, holding a prime position in the Baa Atoll UNESCO Biosphere Reserve in the Maldives. When you're not being dazzled by the natural wonders of your immediate surroundings - crystalline lagoons and verdant jungle are just the beginning - take a culinary journey into gastronomy grandeur at the 11 onsite restaurants. Be wined and dined to Michelin-star standard at Flying Sauces, the world's first fine-dining zipline experience. Or, savour Vietnamese, Japanese and Indonesian cuisine at Out of the Blue, a restaurant floating right on the waters of the Indian Ocean. After the sun has set, the open-air Cinema Paradiso located right on the beach is the perfect way to cap off a day of bliss.
